title: State of Emergency Has Just Been Declared!
text:
By economic news
Tuesday, January 23, 2018 2:40
 
Jamaican Prime Minister Andrew Holness said in a statement that extra steps were needed to “bring the parish of St. James under control and restore public safety.”
In a shocking sudden move, the government ordered an urgent state of emergency ordering all resident and visitors to stay indoors. The threat is to such a degree that people will die if they don’t follow his important order considering the violence and unrest going on outside. Declaring a state of emergency is not an announcement made hastily or without warrant and there’s a good reason the local government felt it was absolutely necessary to preserve human life in an area that has become a war zone.
In what was supposed to be a relaxing and enjoyable vacation time, turned into a complete nightmare within hours surrounding one particular resort popular with tourists. Vacationers were warned not to go to this particular destination and they didn’t listen. Now they’re all locked indoors waiting for the gunfire to end when it will be safe to go outside again, which may not be anytime too soon.
